answers.answer: I can't relate but omg that's scary! 25 weeks did they say why it broke so early?

No they didn't say why.They don't know..I'm very scared but they are at least trying to keep her in until I'm 28 weeks it will be safer to deliver...i just have a week to go! I don't understand how she is surviving without any amniotic fluid..
Probably what ever they giving you in your IV. Good luck! You both giving a strong fight. She's really giving one!
I am so sorry for what you are going through.... Everything will be ok

My water broke at 25 Weeks with my twins(only one of their bags) I had to stay in the hospital. I delivered them at 28 Weeks via c-section because I started to get and infection. My girls weighed 2lbs 9 oz. and 2lbs 7 oz. they were perfect all except their weight. I'm glad I had that shot for their lungs maturity it worked. They stayed in the hospital 1 month and 4 days. They are now healthy 3 year olds. today is their b-day. I will keep you in my prayers.

I cant personally relate but my best friend had my god daughter at 26wks due to preeclampsia...she was 1lb 9oz & almost 4yrs later no one would ever guess she was a super preemie. Shes so outgoing & healthy. Hopefully you can stay pregnant for a while longer but if not ill def pray that your little one is okay! Try not to stress and take everything one day at a time
Just seeing these comments are very reassuring! Thank you everyone!!

question: I am 26 weeks and 6 days...my water broke out the blue at 25 weeks and 6 days..but I haven't went into labor..I have been having slight contractions..but no dialation. I have been in the hospital for about a week now trying to stay pregnant as long as possible. I was given the shot to advance the baby lungs just in case I do give birth very very soon, has anybody been through a similar situation and can reassure me that my daughter will be fine??!! also I had a cervical cerclage put in at 20 weeks...
title: can anybody relate?
